name: Winter Growth
description:
Winter Growth is a horror choose your own adventure game. You are the son of the head of Traveller's Rest village. Sent on a mission to discover what happened to the family living in the next forest clearing, you must do a little detective work, and hopefully nothing will stop you getting home safely.

The controls are simple, press 1 to continue and use the number keys to make your choice. The game is all about the written story, and is smoothly replayable to find that perfect 'good' ending.
